verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I can only imagine
What it will be like
When I walk,By your side
I can only imagine
What my eyes will see
When your face
Is before me, I can only imagine (1x)

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Surrounded by Your glory, what will my heart feel
Will I dance for you Jesus or in honour of you be still
Will I stand in your presence or to my knees will I fall
Will I sing hallelujah, will I be able to speak at all
I can only imagine (1x)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I can only imagine
When that day comes
When I find myself
Standing in the Son
I can only imagine
When all I will do
Is forever
Forever worship You
I can only imagine (1x)
